content: this pattern is inspired by *the frasera flower* it is an afghan block can be used as a blanket cushion cover throw table runner or bag beautiful textured floral and simple pattern **crochet terms** us **skill level** experimental beginners and intermediate **pattern** written instructions and step by step images for every round **size** 20cm x 20cm/8 x 8 after blocking **gauge** medium gauge **hook size** 3 5 mm **yarn** yimian 依棉 milk cotton 依棉 50gm ball **my colourways** less than 1 ball of each colour a light pink b golden c sky blue d light yellow e bud green instagram- @sadika_sobhan 1 special thanks to all my lovely testers you made a great and very helpful job thank you so much *sadika* 1 https //www instagram com/sadika_sobhan igsh=mwq5mgl6emqwbnpjda==
